turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, would you be able to order me a drink from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which Starbucks do you want to pick it up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am in Portage, so the one on route 249 and I94 would be good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cloud Macchiato please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which type of Cloud Macchiato? They have the one that is iced caramel.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make it a Venti please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, did you want it made normally or anything special?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Have them make it with almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will do, any other requests?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Have them add whipped cream on the top and extra caramel drizzle.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I will get it on order for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please confirm when the order is placed.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The order is placed and will be ready soon at the Starbucks on route 249.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome, a receipt will be sent to your phone via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, sounds great. Goodbye!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bye!
